attributes.action: BAN THE SALE OF ANIMALS ON FACEBOOK PAGES
attributes.additional_details: BAN THE SALE OF ALL ANIMALS ON FACEBOOK AND OTHER SOCIAL MEDIA , SITES , PEOPLE TRYING TO MAKE A PROFIT OUT OF SELLING THE ANIMALS, HOW DO YOU KNPOW THE ANIMAL YOU MAY BE  BUYING IS HELATHY, RESCUE AN ANIMAL FROM AN ANIMAL RESCUE THAT PAYS OUT LOADS OF MONEY FOR EACH ANIMAL IT TAKES IN TO HAVE IT NEUTERED  VACCINATED MICROCHIPPED FLEA AND WORMED AND THEY DONT EVEN CHARGE YOU THE FULL COST. PLUS AT LEAST THE HOME IS VETTED YOU SEE THE ANIMAL FIRST.... THIS NEEDS TO BE MADE LAW WE NEED TO GET THIS SUPPORTED BY ANIMAL CHARITIES  UK WIDE.
